schools.name: Adamson
schools.notes: Dallas ISD did not provide which year each of the helmets was purchased. Adamson has the following number of helmets from Schutt: DNA Pro Plus (21), Vengeance DCT (1), Air Advantage (27), Air XP Pro (14), Air XP (11) and Vengeance (28). Adamson has the following number of helmets from Riddell: Revolution (22) and Revolution Speed (5).

schools.name: Duncanville
schools.notes: Duncanville ISD only provided concussion information for the 2015-16 school year. According to a school spokesperson, injury reports were logged but the specific injury was not tracked. The system was changed before last year. A current helmet inventory was not provided, but recent records indicate the school primarily uses Riddell Revolution, Riddell Revolution Speed and Schutt Vengeance helmets. A small number of Riddell VSR4 helmets are also in recent reconditioning records.

schools.name: Ennis
schools.notes: The Dallas Morning News is currently waiting for more information after changes were made to an open records request. The changes were made after the costs for information requested -- current helmet inventory and concussion numbers for the past four seasons -- were too high because of the amount of labor Ennis personnel would have to complete.

schools.name: Flower Mound Marcus

Fort Worth ISD did not provide concussion information for the 2012-13 academic school year.

A current helmet inventory was not provided by Fort Worth ISD, but recent reconditioning records shows that the majority of Fort Worth Arlington Heights' High School's helmets are Riddell Revolution and Riddell Revolution Speed.

Riddell Revolution Speed: 31 purchased in 2016; 68 purchased in 2015
Schutt DNA/Vengeance: 11 purchased in 2007; 12 purchased in 2008; 9 purchased in 2009; 16 purchased in 2011; 23 purchased in 2012; 61 purchased in 2013; 14 purchased in 2014; 19 purchased in 2015.
